Extend Filter then Normalize Scores for Summits

FilterCells.Rd

Extend Filter then Normalize Scores for Summits

FilterCells(ArchRProj, filterList)

Arguments

df

dataframe where first column is sample names 2nd column is group information and 3rd column is MACS2 summit files
genome

mm9, hg19 character or BSgenome object
blacklist

regions to blacklist
extend

how to extend summits (summit +- extend)
scorePerMillion

normalized Score-per-million minimum to keep
selectionRules

string with a formula containing n (majority = (n+1)/2, multiple samples = 2)

Contents

  • Arguments
